data_table.description: The dataset represents variables used to report ratings of neurobehavioral test results (e.g. general intelligence, verbal fluency, learning, attention, abstraction, long-term memory) at baseline, years 2, 5, 7 and close-out (see also <a href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/8021316?ordinalpos=2&itool=EntrezSystem2.PEntrez.Pubmed.Pubmed_ResultsPanel.Pubmed_DefaultReportPanel.Pubmed_RVDocSum"> PMID 8021316</a>; <a href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/8554246?ordinalpos=2&itool=EntrezSystem2.PEntrez.Pubmed.Pubmed_ResultsPanel.Pubmed_DefaultReportPanel.Pubmed_RVDocSum"> PMID 8554246</a>; pht000270, ms7exgee). Specifically, results of patients whose test scores appeared to indicate declining cognitive functions were selected to complete this questionnaire (to assure further testing).

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: DCCT form number

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: Form date as SAS date value

variable.name: HHRATEDT
variable.description: Date rated

variable.name: HHRATINT
variable.description: Rater's initials

variable.name: HHINTEL
variable.description: Intelligence rating (1=above average functioning;2=average functioning;3=borderline - not definitely pathological;4=definite mild impairment;5=definite moderate impairment;6=definite severe impairment;7=not ratable; +/- indicates that the score is thought to be closer to the number above [+] or below [-])

variable.name: HHVERBAL
variable.description: Verbal fluency (1=above average functioning;2=average functioning;3=borderline - not definitely pathological;4=definite mild impairment;5=definite moderate impairment;6=definite severe impairment;7=not ratable; +/- indicates that the score is thought to be closer to the number above [+] or below [-])

variable.name: HHABSTR
variable.description: Abstraction rating (1=above average functioning;2=average functioning;3=borderline - not definitely pathological;4=definite mild impairment;5=definite moderate impairment;6=definite severe impairment;7=not ratable; +/- indicates that the score is thought to be closer to the number above [+] or below [-])

variable.name: HHCALC
variable.description: Calculation rating (1=above average functioning;2=average functioning;3=borderline - not definitely pathological;4=definite mild impairment;5=definite moderate impairment;6=definite severe impairment;7=not ratable; +/- indicates that the score is thought to be closer to the number above [+] or below [-])

variable.name: HHLEARN
variable.description: Learning performance (1=above average functioning;2=average functioning;3=borderline - not definitely pathological;4=definite mild impairment;5=definite moderate impairment;6=definite severe impairment;7=not ratable; +/- indicates that the score is thought to be closer to the number above [+] or below [-])

variable.name: HHSHORTM
variable.description: Short-term memory (1=above average functioning;2=average functioning;3=borderline - not definitely pathological;4=definite mild impairment;5=definite moderate impairment;6=definite severe impairment;7=not ratable; +/- indicates that the score is thought to be closer to the number above [+] or below [-])

variable.name: HHLONGM
variable.description: Long-term memory (1=above average functioning;2=average functioning;3=borderline - not definitely pathological;4=definite mild impairment;5=definite moderate impairment;6=definite severe impairment;7=not ratable; +/- indicates that the score is thought to be closer to the number above [+] or below [-])

variable.name: HHVISUO
variable.description: Visuospatial learning (1=above average functioning;2=average functioning;3=borderline - not definitely pathological;4=definite mild impairment;5=definite moderate impairment;6=definite severe impairment;7=not ratable; +/- indicates that the score is thought to be closer to the number above [+] or below [-])

variable.name: HHCONST
variable.description: Constructional performance (1=above average functioning;2=average functioning;3=borderline - not definitely pathological;4=definite mild impairment;5=definite moderate impairment;6=definite severe impairment;7=not ratable; +/- indicates that the score is thought to be closer to the number above [+] or below [-])

variable.name: HHATTEN
variable.description: Attention rating (1=above average functioning;2=average functioning;3=borderline - not definitely pathological;4=definite mild impairment;5=definite moderate impairment;6=definite severe impairment;7=not ratable; +/- indicates that the score is thought to be closer to the number above [+] or below [-])

variable.name: HHPERCEP
variable.description: Perceptuomotor performance (1=above average functioning;2=average functioning;3=borderline - not definitely pathological;4=definite mild impairment;5=definite moderate impairment;6=definite severe impairment;7=not ratable; +/- indicates that the score is thought to be closer to the number above [+] or below [-])

variable.name: HHSPEED
variable.description: Speed and dexterity (1=above average functioning;2=average functioning;3=borderline - not definitely pathological;4=definite mild impairment;5=definite moderate impairment;6=definite severe impairment;7=not ratable; +/- indicates that the score is thought to be closer to the number above [+] or below [-])

variable.name: HHASYM
variable.description: Asymmetry rating

variable.name: HHGLOBAL
variable.description: Global judgement (1=above average functioning;2=average functioning;3=borderline - not definitely pathological;4=definite mild impairment;5=definite moderate impairment;6=definite severe impairment;7=not ratable; +/- indicates that the score is thought to be closer to the number above [+] or below [-])

variable.name: HHCHANGE
variable.description: Change from last assessment (+/- indicates that the score is thought to be closer to the number above [+] or below [-])

variable.name: RKINTEL
variable.description: Rank: intelligence (1=above average functioning;2=average functioning;3=borderline - not definitely pathological;4=definite mild impairment;5=definite moderate impairment;6=definite severe impairment;7=not ratable; +/- indicates that the score is thought to be closer to the number above [+] or below [-])

variable.name: HHVSITNO
variable.description: Visit number

variable.name: HHRATER
variable.description: Rater number

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: Patient ID number
